plot: Living on a Southern plantation before the Civil War, a young slave girl secretly learns how to read and write, and determines to teach others.
title: Dear America: A Picture of Freedom
plot_es: Living on a Southern plantation before the Civil War, a young slave girl secretly learns how to read and write, and determines to teach others.
original_name: Dear America: A Picture of Freedom
plot_en: Living on a Southern plantation before the Civil War, a young slave girl secretly learns how to read and write, and determines to teach others.
